Description.Text: Hotel Croatia is a stylish 4-star property offering modern accommodation in the heart of Baska Voda. Highlights include a garden and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is located in the centre of Baska Voda, close to the harbour. Baska Voda is a pretty village surrounded by sights of archaeological interest. There are also mountains, pebble beaches and numerous restaurants, bars and cafes. The hotel occupies a charming mid-rise property in the traditional Dalmatian style. Its interior features stone stairwells and a garden. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a clean minimalist style. They boast views overlooking the garden, mountains or hotel atrium. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and safe. The en-suite bathroom features a bathtub with integrated shower. A breakfast is provided every morning. The bar serves a wide selection of hot and cold beverages in a relaxed and friendly setting. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
